name: Suspicious Download with BITS from Suspicious TLD
description: Detects a suspicious download using the BITS client from a FQDN that is unusual. Adversaries may abuse BITS jobs to persistently execute or clean up after malicious payloads.
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Bits\-Client\/Operational AND event.code:16403 AND RemoteName:(/.*[Rr][Aa][Ww]\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ii][Ss][Tt]\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\/.*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Dd][Ii][Aa][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Gg][Aa]\.[Nn][Zz].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Hh][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo]\/.*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Aa][Gg][Ee]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee][Aa][Pp][Ii][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\.[Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\.[Ss][Hh].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Bits\-Client\/Operational AND event.code:16403 AND RemoteName:(*raw.githubusercontent.com* OR *gist.githubusercontent.com* OR *pastebin.com* OR *cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/* OR *mediafire.com* OR *mega.nz* OR *ddns.net* OR *.paste.ee* OR *.hastebin.com* OR *.ghostbin.co\/* OR *ufile.io* OR *storage.googleapis.com* OR *anonfiles.com* OR *send.exploit.in* OR *transfer.sh*))`
